sense.def:
To design something new
pomeni zamisliti si, kakšna bi morala biti neka nova stvar.

seg.quote: The house was designed by local builders.
Tests have been designed to assess mathematical ability.

sense.def:
Design
je proces načrtovanja oblike nekega novega predmeta.

The design of a manufactured object
je oblika ali način izdelave nekega predmeta.

seg.quote: The awkward design of the handles made it difficult to use.

sense.def:
A design
je risba predlagane oblike nekega novega predmeta.

seg.quote: He is submitting a design for the new building.

sense.def:
A design
je tudi okrasna kombinacija črt, cvetov ali likov.

Kadar je nekaj
designed for a purpose
, je namenjeno določenemu cilju.

seg.quote: The laws were designed to protect women.
